results.name: Continued fraction for square root of e.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
D. H. Lehmer, Continued fractions containing arithmetic progressions, Scripta Mathematica, 29 (1973): 17-24. [Annotated copy of offprint]
K. Matthews, Finding the continued fraction of e^(l/m)
T. J. Osler, A proof of the continued fraction expansion of e^(1/M), Amer. Math. Monthly, 113 (No. 1, 2006), 62-66.
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,2,0,0,-1).
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 60000); x=contfrac(sqrt(exp(1))); for (n=1, 20001, write("b058281.txt", n-1, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 01 2009
xref: Cf. A019774 for decimal expansion of sqrt(e).
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 07 2000
